title: Clash of Wills
goal: Eldrin directly confronts and defeats Valerius in a climactic magical and physical battle, ending his immediate threat.
stakes_shift: The outcome of this battle determines the immediate future of the resistance and the city, with Valerius's defeat offering a fragile hope.

bridge.from_prev: The group is engaged in a desperate battle against Valerius and his forces.
bridge.to_next: The immediate aftermath of the battle, revealing the cost of victory and the lingering blight.

sections.title: The Sage vs. The Corrupted Lord
sections.intent: Eldrin engages Valerius in a direct, high-stakes magical duel.

scenes.summary: Eldrin unleashes the full force of his rediscovered magic, engaging Valerius in a devastating duel of ancient light against encroaching shadow.
scenes.outcome: Eldrin engages Valerius in a climactic magical battle, pushing his powers to their limits.

sections.title: Sacrifice and Support
sections.intent: The allies create openings or protect Eldrin, showcasing their loyalty and skills.

scenes.summary: Lyra and Kael bravely hold off corrupted guards, creating crucial openings for Eldrin, while Seraphina shields them with protective wards.
scenes.outcome: The allies provide crucial support, allowing Eldrin to focus his power on Valerius.

sections.title: Valerius's Fall
sections.intent: Eldrin delivers the final blow, defeating Valerius and ending his reign of terror.

scenes.summary: With a final, desperate surge of power, Eldrin overwhelms Valerius, banishing the blight from his form and bringing his reign of terror to an end.
scenes.outcome: Eldrin defeats Valerius, ending his immediate threat to the city.
